name: Bed frame
description:
The client (F/69) is single, with low ID and living alone in a 1-rm rental flat. She has an unsteady gait with weak legs and has potential for fall risks. She uses a quad stick to ambulate in the community. Team has observed her having difficulty standing from a sitting position.

She is currently sleeping on the floor with mattress and 2 pillows. A bed frame would lend her support when she needs to get out of bed. The bed side railing will be beneficial to prevent any fall from the bed. 

She is not particularly homebound, relies on centre-based services for her health management.

name: Adult diapers
description:
We are reaching out on behalf of a senior who is wheelchair-bound and living alone without any next-of-kin. She is currently estranged from her family and faces significant financial challenges. Due to limited mobility and obesity, she relies on adult diapers to manage daily needs, especially during transfers to the toilet.

Her current usage is 6 pieces per day, which places a heavy burden on her monthly expenses.

If you are able to help by donating adult diapers or would like more information, please contact me at 8126 2493.Thanks!
